text: Muž Roku (Man of the Year) is an annual national male beauty pageant that selects Czech Republic's representatives to participate globally. The winner of Muž Roku competes in Mister International and the runners-up compete in Men Universe Model, Manhunt International, Mister Global and Mister United Continents pageants. Between years 2008 and 2012 David Novotný was organizing also Muž Roku Slovenskej Republiky in the same pageant together with Muž Roku for the Czech Republic. ==Titleholders== * Declared as International Winner {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;
